resourceIdentity.description: The managed identity of a resource.

type.description: String of the resource identity type.

principalId.description: GUID that represents the principal ID of this resource identity.

tenantId.description: GUID that represents the tenant ID of this resource identity.

urlNullable.description: Optional string that represents a URL.

apiVersion.name: api-version
apiVersion.description: String that sets the API version.

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: GUID that represents an Azure subscription ID.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: String that represents an Azure resource group.

parentResourcePath.name: parentResourcePath
parentResourcePath.description: String that represents the path to a parent resource starting with the providers segment.

parentProviderNamespace.name: parentProviderNamespace
parentProviderNamespace.description: String that represents a resource provider namespace.

parentResourceType.name: parentResourceType
parentResourceType.description: String that represents a resource type.

parentResourceName.name: parentResourceName
parentResourceName.description: String that represents a resource name.

targetName.name: targetName
targetName.description: String that represents a Target resource name.

capabilityName.name: capabilityName
capabilityName.description: String that represents a Capability resource name.

targetTypeName.name: targetTypeName
targetTypeName.description: String that represents a Target Type resource name.

capabilityTypeName.name: capabilityTypeName
capabilityTypeName.description: String that represents a Capability Type resource name.

locationName.name: locationName
locationName.description: String that represents a Location resource name.

continuationToken.name: continuationToken
continuationToken.description: String that sets the continuation token.
